Field Detail

forms

public Form[] forms
An array of every Form object in the document, created if UserAgent.settings.autoCreateForms = true

metas

public Meta[] metas
An array of every Meta object in the document, created if UserAgent.settings.autoCreateMetas = true

Method Detail

getRequest

public HttpRequest getRequest()
Returns the HttpRequest used to retrieve the document or null if the document was not opened using an HttpRequest.

getUserAgent

public UserAgent getUserAgent()
Returns the UserAgent associated with the Document.

removeUserAgent

public void removeUserAgent()
Sets the UserAgent reference for this Document to null.

getSize

public int getSize()
Returns the size in bytes of the data stream used to construct this document.

getForm

public Form getForm(java.lang.String nameRx)
Searches the document's forms[] property and returns the first form with the matching (case insensitive) nameRx or null if none was found.

Parameters:
nameRx - a (case insensitive) regular expression matching the value of the name attribute in the form tag (using Matcher.find), or null to match any name.

getForm

public Form getForm(java.lang.String nameRx,
                    java.lang.String actionRx,
                    java.lang.String[] buttonLabelRxs)
Searches the document's forms[] property and returns the first form matching all specified criteria or null if none was found.

Parameters:
nameRx - a (case insensitive) regular expression matching the value of the name attribute in the form tag (using Matcher.find), or null to match any name.
actionRx - a (case insensisitve) regular expression matching the absolute url of the action attribute value (using Matcher.find), or null to match any url
buttonLabelRxs - an array of buttonLabel regular expressions all of which must be matched by the buttons of a form (using Matcher.find), or null to match any button(s).

followMetaRedirect

public boolean followMetaRedirect(int redirectCount)
                           throws com.jaunt_api.ResponseException
Follows the first redirecting meta tag that exists outside of noscript tags.

Returns:
true if a meta tag was followed.
Throws:
com.jaunt_api.ResponseException

followMetaRedirect

public boolean followMetaRedirect(boolean processNoscriptMetas,
                                  int redirectCount)
                           throws com.jaunt_api.ResponseException
Follows the first redirecting meta tag.

Parameters:
processNoscriptMetas - whether to follow meta tag redirections that occur within noscript tags.
Returns:
true if a meta tag was followed.
Throws:
com.jaunt_api.ResponseException

headersToString

public java.lang.String headersToString()
Returns a string representation of the headers.

fillout

public Form fillout(java.lang.String label,
                    java.lang.String value)
             throws NotFound,
                    MultipleFound
Fills the textfield, password field, or textarea field that has the specified text label with the specified value.

Parameters:
label - case-insensitive, space-insensitive, left-side label.
Returns:
a reference to the form associated with the field that was chosen.
Throws:
NotFound
MultipleFound

select

public Form select(java.lang.String label,
                   java.lang.String optionRegex)
            throws NotFound,
                   MultipleFound
Completes the dropdown menu or menu list (ie select component) that has the specified text label (case insensitive, space insensitive) with the option(s) that matches (using Matcher.matches) the specified (case insensitive) regular expression.

Parameters:
label - case-insensitive, space-insensitive, left-side label.
optionRegex - case-insensitive regular expresion to match the text of one or more options.
Returns:
a reference to the form associated with the option that was chosen.
Throws:
NotFound
MultipleFound

choose

public Form choose(short labelOrientation,
                   java.lang.String labelRegex)
            throws NotFound,
                   MultipleFound
Selects the radiobutton or checkbox who's label is matched by the specified (case-insensitive) regular expression.

Parameters:
labelRegex - case-insensitive regular expression matching the label of the radiobutton or checkbox.
labelOrientation - Text orientation constant indicating the position of the label with respect to the radiobutton or checkbox.
Returns:
the form associated with the radiobutton or checkbox that was chosen.
Throws:
NotFound
MultipleFound

unchoose

public Form unchoose(short labelOrientation,
                     java.lang.String labelRegex)
              throws NotFound,
                     MultipleFound
Deselects the radiobutton or checkbox who's label is matched by the specified (case-insensitive) regular expression.

Parameters:
labelRegex - case-insensitive regular expression matching the label of the radiobutton or checkbox.
labelOrientation - Text orientation constant indicating the position of the label with respect to the radiobutton or checkbox.
Returns:
the form associated with the radiobutton or checkbox that was chosen.
Throws:
NotFound
MultipleFound

submit

public Form submit()
            throws NotFound,
                   MultipleFound
Submits the active form by pressing the submit button, throws a MultipleFound exception if more than one submit button exists.

Returns:
a reference to the Form that was submitted.
Throws:
NotFound
MultipleFound

submit

public Form submit(java.lang.String buttonLabelRegex)
            throws NotFound,
                   MultipleFound
Submits the form using the submit button who's text matches the specified (case insensitive) regular expression, using Matcher.matches.

Parameters:
buttonLabelRegex - case-insensitive regular expression to match the value of the submit button's value attribute.
Returns:
a reference to the Form that was submitted.
Throws:
NotFound
MultipleFound
